1110110100111110 1011010111110111 1 -> sum: 1010001100110110, cout: 1
0011011010010101 0001000111111110 0 -> sum: 0100100010010011, cout: 0
1011011001100111 1011101010000111 1 -> sum: 0111000011101111, cout: 1
1011111100011010 0111111001001011 0 -> sum: 0011110101100101, cout: 1
1100010000101100 1110010011100110 0 -> sum: 1010100100010010, cout: 1
1010110111110110 0100001100110011 1 -> sum: 1111000100101010, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
